Covid-19: Protection equipment for medical staff among Ministry’s prorities
snippet: ALGIERS-The Ministry of Health, Population and Hospital Reform Abderrahmane Benbouzid on Thursday affirmed that providing protection equipment for the medical staff was among the Ministry’s priorities...

title: Algerian Embassy in the United States of America
snippet: ALGIERS – Minister of Health, Population and Hospital Reform, Abderrahmane Benbouzid, met in Algiers with Resident Coordinator of the United Nations System in Algeria, Eric Overvest and the WHO Representative in Algeria, Dr Bla François Nguessan, said a ministry statement on Sunday.
